fullText: This handsome revival of Rodgers and Hammerstein's dark masterpiece is well-served by a strong cast and thoughtful direction, even if it doesn't quite capture the show's full emotional impact.
dtliExcerpt: This handsome revival of Rodgers and Hammerstein's dark masterpiece is well-served by a strong cast and thoughtful direction, even if it doesn't quite capture the show's full emotional impact.
